N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.6 - Standards for approval of safety program

State Regulations
(a) The safety program shall provide
comprehensive instruction in the occupation and work process for which the
minor is being trained and on the safe use of machinery, equipment and devices
and should include instruction on the following: (1)

Good work habits and safe
practices. (2)

Accidents and
accident prevention. (3)

Personal
protective devices. (4)

Fire
protection and prevention. (5)

Hand
and portable tool safety. (b) All machinery, equipment and devices in
the shop where the safety instruction is given shall be so placed, operated, guarded and lighted as required by the provisions of the Labor Law and the
safety and health standards promulgated by the commissioner or the State Board
of Standards and Appeals. Notes
